products.name: Volvo
products.description: VOLVO, is a Swedish luxury vehicles brand and a subsidiary of the Chinese automotive company Geely. It is headquartered in Torslanda in Gothenburg, Sweden.

products.name: Mercedes
products.description: Mercedes-Benz is known for luxury vehicles, vans, trucks, buses, coaches and ambulances.

products.name: Audi
products.description: Audi is a member of the Volkswagen Group and has its roots at Ingolstadt, Bavaria, Germany.

products.name: Washing Machine
products.description: A washing machine is a machine that washes dirty clothes.

products.name: Television
products.description: A television (also known as a TV) is a machine with a screen. Televisions receive broadcasting signals and change them into pictures and sound.

products.name: Refrigerators
products.description: A refrigerator is a machine for keeping things cold. It is sometimes called a fridge or an icebox.

products.name: Mobiles
products.description: A mobile phone (also known as a hand phone, cell phone, or cellular telephone) is a small portable radio telephone.

products.name: Tablets
products.description: A tablet is a wireless touch screen personal computer (PC) that is smaller than a notebook but larger than a smartphone.

products.name: Laptops
products.description: A laptop computer is a portable personal computer powered by a battery, or an AC cord plugged into an electrical outlet, which is also used to charge the battery.
